entry.title: WIND WARNING , Crowsnest
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:14 PM MST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Crowsnest 02:00 AM MST Friday 17 February 2023
Temperature: -1.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 59 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -8.9°C
Wind: WNW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. A few flurries near the British Columbia border overnight. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 100 in wind prone areas late this evening and after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 9:12 PM MST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. A few flurries near the British Columbia border. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:12 PM MST Thursday 16 February 2023
